Title: Kyou mo Chappy End
Description: ['Chappy is a portmanteau of Cha (Tea) and Happy. The song praises tea and how a warm cup can help improve your mood from a crummy day.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Shichikon no Ryuujinmaru', 'Other: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari']
